articles.title: Rupert Murdoch, 92, is getting married for the fifth time - Business Insider
articles.description: "I dreaded falling in love — but I knew this would be my last. It better be. I'm happy," Murdoch told New York Post columnist Cindy Adams.
articles.content:
Media mogul Rupert Murdoch is giving love another shot at the age of 92.
